title: Advanced OCR
subtitle: Extract text from images and documents
description: Upload images or PDF documents to automatically extract text and add it to your knowledge base for advanced graphological analysis.

uploadArea.title: Upload File
uploadArea.description: Drag your files here or click to select them
uploadArea.supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, PDF, TIFF

dpi.label: DPI Resolution
dpi.description: Higher resolution = better quality, but slower processing

preprocessing.label: Preprocessing
preprocessing.description: Choose how to process the image before text extraction

explanations.auto: Automatically applies standard corrections for most documents. Recommended for good quality documents.
explanations.enhance: Improves contrast and brightness of the image. Ideal for faded documents, low contrast, or poor lighting.
explanations.denoise: Reduces background noise and converts to pure black and white. Perfect for badly scanned documents with spots and interference.
explanations.sharpen: Increases character sharpness. Great for blurry document photos or low resolution images.

whenToUse.auto:
• Good quality printed documents
• Clean, well-lit scans
• When you're unsure which option to choose
whenToUse.enhance:
• Faded or hard-to-read documents
• Photos with poor lighting
• Low contrast between text and background
whenToUse.denoise:
• Documents with spots or marks
• Scans with background noise
• Grainy or pixelated images
whenToUse.sharpen:
• Blurry document photos
• Low resolution images
• Text that appears poorly defined

auto.title: Automatic
auto.useFor: Use for: Clean documents, good quality scans, when unsure which option to choose.

enhance.title: Enhance Contrast
enhance.description: Increases contrast and brightness for faded text.
enhance.useFor: Use for: Faded documents, poor lighting photos, barely visible text.

denoise.title: Reduce Noise
denoise.description: Removes spots and interference by converting to black/white.
denoise.useFor: Use for: Dirty scans, documents with spots, grainy images.

sharpen.title: Increase Sharpness
sharpen.description: Makes characters more defined and readable.
sharpen.useFor: Use for: Blurry photos, low resolution images, poorly defined text.

tip.title: Tip:
tip.text: If unsure, start with "Automatic". You can always retry with a different option if results aren't satisfactory.
